turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey sally i would like to order 2 pizza's from luigis on main street in town.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza's did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm just looking at the menu and I'm really not sure this one with pineapples and ham looks good, so i'll take one pineapple pizza with extra ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To clarify the pineapple one is actually called a Hawaiian pizza because of the pineapple on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh well that makes sense. Hmm not sure if i want a sicilian, or perhaps a margarita one. I wonder if it is a margarita does it have tequila on it??

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A margarita pizza is actually made with basils, cheese and some thick tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that makes sense, but tequila would have been nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so we have one Hawaiian pizza what else would you like, did you want the margarita.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No i'm thinking something bigger

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a large Sicilian which would be about 16 pieces.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that's perfect let's get a Sicilian with half pepperoni's and half sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so that is one Sicilian with half pepperoni and half sausage on it. And one Hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure to make the Hawaiian a large pizza size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok i will tell them , a Sicilian only comes in 1 size.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please tell Luigi to charge my account he knows me well and i can use it as a tax right off.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok i have called Luigi's and they said it should take about 25 minutes to have ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And you told them to charge it to my account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes he will charge it to your account and send you a receipt to your email on file

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you i will pick the pizza's up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your very welcome i hope you enjoy them!
